Instruction: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Prepare muffin tins by greasing the cups or lining them with paper liners.
Cream butter and sugar until smooth and fluffy in a large bowl. Mix in eggs one at a time, then add vanilla. Combine 2 cups flour, baking powder, and salt in another bowl.

"Combine the flour mixture with the egg mixture and milk, then fold in the blueberries. Fill muffin cups with the batter. Mix flour, brown sugar, and cinnamon in a small bowl. Crumble in butter until it resembles coarse crumbs. Sprinkle this topping over the unbaked muffins."
Bake the muffins in the preheated oven for 25 to 30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
